channel.title: 2 problems =[ please help
channel.description:
im having 2 problems at the mo First: people CANNOT join my server but i can yes i have forwarded my ports but does not work
Second: I was on my server eariler for 2hours then logged off then back on then off when i tryied to log it it freezes and says "please wait connection lost" i cannot gte on my server now please help
